mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(reserve_date, bus_id, station_id) VALUES (#{reserveDate}, #{busId}, #{stationId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.reservation_id, a.reserve_date, a.station_id, b.main_place, b.detail_place, b.departure_time, b.office_place, b.office_time, b.bus_id, b.car_num as bus_number, b.phone as bus_driver_number FROM reservation a LEFT JOIN nosun b on a.station_id = b.station_id WHERE a.reserve_date >=Now() ORDER BY a.reserve_date

SELECT a.reserve_date as date, IFNULL(a.remain_seat-b.count_reserve, a.remain_seat) as remain_seats_count FROM ( SELECT temp_date as reserve_date, 44 as remain_seat FROM ( SELECT @rnum:=@rnum+1 as rownum, date(adddate('2022-01-01', interval @rnum day)) as temp_date FROM ( SELECT @rnum:=-1 ) r, dummydatenum ) k WHERE DATE_FORMAT(temp_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m')) a left join ( SELECT reserve_date, count(reserve_date) as count_reserve FROM reservation WHERE bus_id=#{busId} GROUP BY reserve_date) b on a.reserve_date = b.reserve_date
